title: A Guide to the “Ask Download Path for Each File” Feature on Telegram

steps.title: Click the three-line menu in Telegram.
steps.content: Click the three-line menu in Telegram. You can find the triple bar icon on the top-left side of the app, near the search box. When you click on it, a menu panel will appear.

steps.title: Click the Settings option.
steps.content: Click the Settings option. You'll see the settings tab after doing so.

steps.title: Click Advanced under "Chat Settings."
steps.content: Click Advanced under "Chat Settings." This displays your advanced Telegram options.

steps.title: Clicking the slider next to "Ask download path for each file" enables the feature.
steps.content: Clicking the slider next to "Ask download path for each file" enables the feature. Now when you click the download button on Telegram, the app will ask you to select the download location. Finished!
